Class PipeSet

java.lang.Object
PipeSet
public class PipeSet extends Object
Class to create a set of pipes and flames from the RightToLeft class

  • Constructor Summary

  • Constructor Details

    • PipeSet

      public PipeSet​(int level, int centre)
      Constructor that initializes pipe type based on level at a given point
      Parameters:
      level - The level of the pipe (plastic/steel)
      centre - The randomized centre of the pipe

  • Method Details

    • addPipes

      public void addPipes​(int level, int centre)
      Add pipes to the Array List (top and bottom)
      Parameters:
      level - The level of the pipe (plastic/steel)
      centre - The centre of the pipe

    • addFlames

      public void addFlames​(int centre)
      Add flames to the Array List
      Parameters:
      centre - The centre of the pipe to place the flames

      public boolean birdWeaponCollision​(Bird bird)
      Check if bird (and weapon) has collided with the pipe set
      Parameters:
      bird - The bird in play
      Returns:
      Returns true if collision occurs

    • checkCollision

      public boolean checkCollision​(bagel.util.Rectangle box, boolean withFlames)
      Check if collision between given object and the pipes and flames
      Parameters:
      box - Bounding box of object to check collision with
      withFlames - If checking collision with flames as well
      Returns:
      Returns true if collision occurs
